find the association between director's facebook like and gross
```{r}
dataset = read.csv("./imdb_model_clean.csv") 
dataset %>% 
  filter(director_facebook_likes != 0 & director_facebook_likes < 2000 ) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = director_facebook_likes, y = gross)) +
  geom_point()

dataset %>% 
  filter(director_facebook_likes != 0 & 2000 < director_facebook_likes) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = director_facebook_likes, y = gross, color =  )) +
  geom_point() 
 # from above two plots we can see that there is no direct association between director's facebook like and  movie's gross
```
